# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, representing years of dedication and innovation. I believe its worth extends far beyond its monetary value, making it a true treasure. Given its significance to both of us, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure this remarkable product at a premium yet reasonable cost, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this masterpiece with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
